relevance_explanation: The routine correctly removes irrelevant branches based on the customer data. The customer has less than 30,000 loyalty points, so the "preferred client" logic was removed. The booking allows cancellations, so that check was also correctly removed.
completeness_explanation: All required logic, tools, and branches that apply to this customer are preserved. The routine includes the necessary tool calls and conditional checks for processing the cancellation and potential refund.
